Text.Page:
We've lost contact with our cousins in Crescentia. The devas surged past our camps and cut off the town, and the trade that goes with it.

Head east, through the cave and report to {@LinkCreature:203#1004#Neacal} at Bulwark Camp. Do what you can to assist him. If you're half as much help in Oblivion Woods as you were here, they'll be just fine.

Reporting in? Terrific.

The devas overran the woods and set up numerous camps. Normally, they confine themselves to Deva Silva, but something got into them recently.

They're tough and cunning, but with your help, we might just knock 'em back.
